clinical_logic.readiness_milestone: Wound healing progress and completion of daily SNF wound care regimen
clinical_barriers: Sacral pressure injury requiring advanced dressing care
Recovery from in-SNF fall affecting mobility

environmental_logic.physical_barriers: Home readiness for return from 77-day stay
bureaucratic_steps: Social Worker referral for external wound program

timeline_deltas.context: 11/26 discharge fell on Thanksgiving week; PN had to navigate reduced nursing availability to maintain the date.
Patient expressed doubt that daughter would actually arrive for pick-up; PN had to monitor until the physical exit occurred.

reasoning_trace_triples.situation: PN excluded from formal facility clinical meetings/EMR
reasoning_trace_triples.action_taken: Back-channel communication with 'traditional provider' via text/Teams
reasoning_trace_triples.result: Maintained accuracy of 11/26 discharge estimate despite lack of system access.

reasoning_trace_triples.action_taken: Offsetting PN-service home visit to a different day
reasoning_trace_triples.result: Increased touchpoints for the patient without overlapping/conflicting with HHA visits.

rank_1_best_practices.context: Patient not in original hub/referral stream
rank_1_best_practices.action: Facilitated multi-stage approval (Review team + Medical Director)
rank_1_best_practices.rationale: Ensured clinical and insurance eligibility before promising services to SW.

rank_0_boundary_failures.action: Relying on verbal updates from providers/SW rather than EMR access
